title: The Rank que Fear
body:
Hey guys,

When I started this season I was on a 23 win streak before I lost my first game (Including 10/10 win on promos) I have already played over 100 games this season but recently I have start to lose a lot of game ridiculous amounts in the past 20 games I have won i think 6 Its got to the point where I am honestly to nervous to que because I have already de ranked so much.  My question is. Are there any tips you can provide to stay chill and keep playing more ranked games even solo. Idk how long I can drink alcohol for before I ruin myself. Any Ideas? 

Legit afraid to que please help.

replies.body: If you start losing 2 game +  stop playing rank do something else beside league flashing your mind up and come back start flash again. listen to music while you play rank is not a bad idea help you focus and every game after take 5 mins break think what did you do wrong or what can you do better and that game. Hopefully my advice can help you do better

Hopefully my advice can help you do better

Something along the lines of what this ^.^ guy said :)
Win, loss who cares? Play the game to get better and you'll rise eventually.

Calming, instrumental music helps settle the mind and will aid in relaxation while playing. Also if you're hungry or thirsty or otherwise discomforted by something outside the game, fix that first. Other than that, just don't take the game too seriously to the point that it begins to ruin your health.

If your losing games after having long streaks of wins, all it means is you're reaching your MMR which is never a bad thing.

I'd be able to give you more, but your posting on a level 3 account.
